section.title: Approaches
section.para: Outlined in this section will be approaches for estimation of surface runoff together with the advantages and disadvantages. Guidance on the selection of approaches will be provided. It is expected that the theoretical background for alternative approaches will not be replicated here (this theory should be presented earlier in Book 5) but rather the specific aspects relevant to urban drainage will be highlighted.
